publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-763 Bruce Crawford: Health of Dockyard Workers-That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to enter into discussions with the Ministry of Defence and Fife NHS Board on the possibility of conducting a study into the potential ill health effects of exposure to radiation suffered by people while employed at Rosyth Dockyard in order to establish if there is any link between their exposure to radiation while employed at the dockyard and any ill health they have suffered and, if deceased, any link between their employment and cause of death.

S2M-763 Health of Dockyard Workers (lodged on 7 January 2004) Stewart Stevenson*, Brian Adam*, Rob Gibson*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*, Shiona Baird*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Ms Sandra White*, Jim Mather*, Carolyn Leckie*, Alex Neil*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Campbell Martin*, Chris Ballance*

S2M-763 Bruce Crawford: Health of Dockyard Workers-That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to enter into discussions with the Ministry of Defence and Fife NHS Board on the possibility of conducting a study into the potential ill health effects of exposure to radiation suffered by people while employed at Rosyth Dockyard in order to establish if there is any link between their exposure to radiation while employed at the dockyard and any ill health they have suffered and, if deceased, any link between their employment and cause of death. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Brian Adam, Rob Gibson, Eleanor Scott, Mr Adam Ingram, Michael Matheson, Shiona Baird, Roseanna Cunningham, Ms Sandra White, Jim Mather, Carolyn Leckie, Alex Neil, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Campbell Martin, Chris Ballance, Robin Harper*, Frances Curran*
S2M-763 Health of Dockyard Workers (lodged on 7 January 2004) Tricia Marwick*, Dr Jean Turner*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-763 Health of Dockyard Workers (lodged on 7 January 2004) Mr Mark Ruskell*

S2M-763 Health of Dockyard Workers (lodged on 7 January 2004) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-763 Health of Dockyard Workers (lodged on 7 January 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-763 Health of Dockyard Workers (lodged on 7 January 2004) Shona Robison*, Fergus Ewing*, Richard Lochhead*
S2M-763 Health of Dockyard Workers (lodged on 7 January 2004) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S2M-763 Health of Dockyard Workers (lodged on 7 January 2004) Alasdair Morgan*

S2M-763 Health of Dockyard Workers (lodged on 7 January 2004) Linda Fabiani*
